ticket.title: [PATCH] shortcut to unscoped named_scope
ticket.original-body:
Sometimes people write code like this:
@@@ Post.unscoped.on_apple.first Post.unscoped.on_google.first @@@
So you may be interested in shortcuts to default_scope ignored version of the named_scope you defined?
@@@ Post.on_apple!.first Post.on_google!.first @@@
